name: FREE California Permit Test 2 - Real 2025 DMV Test Questions
headline: 2025 California Permit Test 2
alternativeHeadline: 2025 California Permit Test 2 | DMV Written Test

about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: If you are convicted of driving with an excessive blood alcohol concentration (BAC), you may be sentenced to serve:

about.name: If you are convicted of driving with an excessive blood alcohol concentration (BAC), you may be sentenced to serve:

hasPart.assesses: If you are convicted of driving with an excessive blood alcohol concentration (BAC), you may be sentenced to serve: | If you are convicted of driving with an excessive blood alcohol concentration (BAC), you may be sentenced to serve: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you are convicted of DUI for the first time and you have an excessive BAC level, you may be sentenced to serve up to six months in jail and may be required to pay a fine between $390 and $1,000. Your vehicle may be impounded and is subject to storage fees.

suggestedAnswer.text: Up to six months in jail.

comment.text: Up to six months in jail.
Up to 12 months in jail.

suggestedAnswer.text: No jail time, but you must pay a fine of $500.

comment.text: No jail time, but you must pay a fine of $500.

acceptedAnswer.text: Up to six months in jail.

comment.text: Up to six months in jail.

answerExplanation.text: If you are convicted of DUI for the first time and you have an excessive BAC level, you may be sentenced to serve up to six months in jail and may be required to pay a fine between $390 and $1,000. Your vehicle may be impounded and is subject to storage fees.

comment.text: If you are convicted of driving with an excessive blood alcohol concentration (BAC), you may be sentenced to serve: | If you are convicted of DUI for the first time and you have an excessive BAC level, you may be sentenced to serve up to six months in jail and may be required to pay a fine between $390 and $1,000. Your vehicle may be impounded and is subject to storage fees.

hasPart.name: While driving, you should look 10 to 15 seconds ahead of you:

about.name: While driving, you should look 10 to 15 seconds ahead of you:

hasPart.assesses: While driving, you should look 10 to 15 seconds ahead of you: | While driving, you should look 10 to 15 seconds ahead of you: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: To avoid last-minute moves, scan the road 10 to 15 seconds ahead of your vehicle so you can see hazards early. Constantly staring at the road right in front of your vehicle is dangerous.

suggestedAnswer.text: And focus on the middle of the road.

comment.text: And focus on the middle of the road.

suggestedAnswer.text: Because it is a legal requirement.

comment.text: Because it is a legal requirement.
To see potential hazards early.
To see potential hazards early.

answerExplanation.text: To avoid last-minute moves, scan the road 10 to 15 seconds ahead of your vehicle so you can see hazards early. Constantly staring at the road right in front of your vehicle is dangerous.

comment.text: While driving, you should look 10 to 15 seconds ahead of you: | To avoid last-minute moves, scan the road 10 to 15 seconds ahead of your vehicle so you can see hazards early. Constantly staring at the road right in front of your vehicle is dangerous.

hasPart.name: This sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This sign means: | This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Signs with a red circle and diagonal line over a black symbol indicate the the action represented by the symbol is prohibited. In this case, the sign indicates that right turns are prohibited.

comment.text: No right turn.

suggestedAnswer.text: Right turn on red light permitted with caution.

comment.text: Right turn on red light permitted with caution.

suggestedAnswer.text: All traffic must turn right at next intersection.

comment.text: All traffic must turn right at next intersection.
No right turn.

answerExplanation.text: Signs with a red circle and diagonal line over a black symbol indicate the the action represented by the symbol is prohibited. In this case, the sign indicates that right turns are prohibited.

comment.text: This sign means: | Signs with a red circle and diagonal line over a black symbol indicate the the action represented by the symbol is prohibited. In this case, the sign indicates that right turns are prohibited.

hasPart.name: To see vehicles in your blind spots, you should check:

about.name: To see vehicles in your blind spots, you should check:

hasPart.assesses: To see vehicles in your blind spots, you should check: | To see vehicles in your blind spots, you should check: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: By definition, blind spots are areas that cannot be seen using your mirrors. To check your blind spots, you should look over your shoulders.

comment.text: The inside rearview mirror.
The outside rearview mirror.
Over your shoulders.
Over your shoulders.

answerExplanation.text: By definition, blind spots are areas that cannot be seen using your mirrors. To check your blind spots, you should look over your shoulders.

comment.text: To see vehicles in your blind spots, you should check: | By definition, blind spots are areas that cannot be seen using your mirrors. To check your blind spots, you should look over your shoulders.
